sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-form class="form" @submit="onSubmit" @reset="onReset" v-if="show">
    <b-form-group>
      <b-form-input
        class="input-field"
        id="username"
        v-model="form.username"
        type="text"
        required
        placeholder="Uporabniško ime"
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>

    <b-form-group>
      <b-form-input
        class="input-field"
        id="password"
        v-model="form.password"
        required
        placeholder="Geslo"
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>

    <b-form-checkbox-group v-model="form.checked" id="isAdmin-group">
      <b-form-checkbox value="isAdmin">Prijava kot administrator</b-form-checkbox>
    </b-form-checkbox-group>

    <b-button type="submit" variant="primary">Prijava</b-button>  
    <b-button type="reset" variant="danger">Počisti</b-button>
  </b-form>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    name: 'Login',
    data() {
      return {
        form: {
          username: '',
          password: '',
          checked: false
        },
        show: true
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSubmit(evt) {
        evt.preventDefault()
        alert(JSON.stringify(this.form))
      },
      onReset(evt) {
        evt.preventDefault()
        // Reset our form values
        this.form.password = ''
        this.form.username = ''
        this.form.checked = false
        // Trick to reset/clear native browser form validation state
        this.show = false
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          this.show = true
        })
      }
    }
  }

</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
  .input-field {
    margin: 10px 0;
  }
</style>
